summary.span: 提供对托管代码中支持的所有 CardSpace 公共操作的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to all CardSpace public operations that are supported in managed code.

summary.span: 使用 CardSpace 系统生成安全令牌。

span.span: Generates a security token using the CardSpace system.

param.name: policyChain
param.span: 的数组，它描述了客户端需要使用最终令牌才能展开的联合安全链。

span.span: An array of that describes the federated security chain that the client requires a final token to unwind.

summary.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 系统以及指定的策略链和令牌序列化程序来生成安全令牌。

span.span: Generates a security token using the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] system and the specified policy chain and token serializer.

returns.span: 表示所生成的安全令牌的 。

span.span: A that represents the generated security token.

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 一个 ，它表示令牌接收方的、将出示令牌的终结点地址。

span.span: An that represents the endpoint address of the recipient where the token is presented.

param.name: policy
param.span: 一个 类型的 ，它包含策略片段，指定了接收方所请求的令牌类型和声明。

span.span: An of type that contains a policy fragment that specifies the token types and claims that are requested by the recipient.
An that represents the issuer of the token.

summary.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 系统以及指定的终结点、策略、令牌颁发者和令牌序列化程序生成安全令牌。

span.span: Generates a security token using the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] system and the specified endpoint, policy, token issuer, and token serializer.

returns.span: 表示所生成的安全令牌的 。

span.span: A that represents the generated security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌可由用户颁发，也可由策略颁发者指定的第三方颁发。A security token can be issued by the user or by a third party that is specified by the policy issuer.

summary.span: 显示允许用户创建、删除、重命名和修改卡的 [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 管理用户界面。

span.span: Displays the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] management user interface that allows the user to create, delete, rename, and modify the card.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于隐私和安全方面的原因，[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 不提供对用于进行生命周期管理的卡的编程访问。[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] does not provide programmatic access to the cards for life-cycle management for privacy and security reasons. 例如，无法以编程方式创建、删除或枚举卡。For example, you cannot programmatically create, delete, or enumerate cards.
